rules_text:
Whenever this creature transforms into Tina, Lightbound Lockpick, you gain 1 life for each artifact you control.
[i]Locktouch[/i] –Whenever Tina attacks and isn't blocked, create a Treasure token.
[i]Unlock[/i] – {W}{W}: Tap target artifact you don't control. Tina gains all abilities of that artifact for as long as it remains tapped.
